description: React functional component 'ToastContainer' that renders a list of toast notifications with ARIA accessibility features. It displays toasts with different styles based on their type and allows dismissing individual toasts.

methods.name: ToastContainer({ toasts = [], onDismiss })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a stack of toasts with accessibility attributes, customizable through 'toasts' array and 'onDismiss' callback.
